response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value and relevance to your endeavors, valued at $800,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable asset to you at a special introductory price of $750,000.
